contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=June 2013}} {{nihongo|'''Kenichi Yamakawa'''|山川 健一|Yamakawa Ken'ichi|born 19 July 1953}} is a Japanese author<ref>{{cite web|title=Be Happy!|url=http://www.yamaken.com/|work=yamaken.com|accessdate=11 January 2011}}</ref> and [[Rock and roll|rock]] musician. == Books (written in Japanese) == *''Kagami no Naka no Glass no Fune'' (A Glass Ship in the Mirror) *''Suishoh no Yoru'' (Christal Nacht) *''Rolling Kids'' *''Rockn'roll Games'' *''Macintosh High'' == Albums == *''Backstreet'' ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Authority control|VIAF=93789802}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Yamakawa, Kenichi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese writer | DATE OF BIRTH = 1953 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yamakawa, Kenichi}} [[Category:Japanese writers]] [[Category:Japanese musicians]] [[Category:1953 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Chiba, Chiba]] {{Japan-writer-stub}}
